reactions.name: reactions
reactions.description: List (comma separated) of possible reactions in this hunt

item_name.name: item_name
item_name.description: Name of an item that should be given to person that reacted

quantity.name: quantity
quantity.description: Amount of items that should be given. For range specify min and max value

require_item.name: require_item
require_item.description: Item required and removed upon upon reacting

require_quantity.name: require_quantity
require_quantity.description: Amount of items needed in order to claim. For range specify min and max value

exchange_ratio.name: exchange_ratio
exchange_ratio.description: Ratio of Required to Received items. Set to 0 for random

max_winners.name: max_winners
max_winners.description: Limit of winners per each drop. Set to 0 for no limit

lottery.name: lottery
lottery.description: Whether all or random should receive reward (Depending on max_winners)

active_within.name: active_within
active_within.description: Amount of last messages in a channel in which user should be present to be eligible

repeating.name: repeating
repeating.description: Whether this hunt should be repeating
